name: Lightsworn Sanctuary
effectText: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 other "Lightsworn" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the GY, place 1 Shine Counter on this card. If a "Lightsworn" card(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can remove 2 Shine Counters from your field for each of those "Lightsworn" card(s) instead.
